org.cogroo.text.impl

Class SentenceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cogroo.text.impl.SentenceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sentence

    public class SentenceImpl
extends Object
implements Sentence
    The Sentence class contains the position of the sentence in the text and the list of word in it.
